name: Cringe Castle (Chipper Deer Studio)
description:
Help a brave young knight hero in his quest to defeat the evil necromancer! This game was made for Sonicworkflow's Valentine's Day Jam 2021, which had the theme of "cringe." I got a bit of a late start and the theme was a little tough, but I'm overall happy with how everything turned out! I hope you enjoy.

======= Controls =======

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Sword Attack

Right Mouse - Magic Missile

======= Programs/Tools Used =======

Godot engine (https://godotengine.org/)

Aesprite (https://www.aseprite.org/)

Tilesetter (https://www.tilesetter.org/)

sfxr (http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)

======= Assets =======

Font: Dogica by Roberto Mocci (https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font)

Background Music: Castle Boss by madameberry (https://opengameart.org/content/patreon-songs-castle-boss-and-solemn-tide)

All other visual and audio assets were made by me during the jam window!
